job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We need your help to build and run groundbreaking Gen AI solutions that are as valuable for our customers to use as they are fun for us to develop. You can build web applications autonomously from scratch. As a Full Stack Engineer, you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsibility for your solutions.
   Practical examples
     * Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work.
     * Build responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions for millions of customers.
     * Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
     * Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems.

   Facts & figures
     * 36 or 40 hours a week.
     * Mostly greenfield, limited legacy work.
     * 43,822 Rabobank colleagues around the world.

   Top responsibilities
     * Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions.
     * Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
     * Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together.
job_details.full_text:
Rabobank - Junior Full Stack Engineer

We need your help to build and run groundbreaking Gen AI solutions that are as valuable for our customers to use as they are fun for us to develop. You can build web applications autonomously from scratch. As a Full Stack Engineer, you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsibility for your solutions.
   Practical examples
     * Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work.
     * Build responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions for millions of customers.
     * Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
     * Pair-program with other team members to solve critical or complex problems.

   Facts & figures
     * 36 or 40 hours a week.
     * Mostly greenfield, limited legacy work.
     * 43,822 Rabobank colleagues around the world.

   Top responsibilities
     * Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions.
     * Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
     * Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and running GenAI solutions, including developing reusable building blocks and contributing to automation. It highlights end-to-end responsibility for these solutions, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on productionizing generative models.

phrases: build and run groundbreaking Gen AI solutions
build web applications autonomously from scratch
end-to-end responsibility for your solutions
Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams
Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the development of user-facing applications and infrastructure to support GenAI solutions, including building from scratch, creating reusable components, and ensuring scalability and quality.

phrases: run groundbreaking Gen AI solutions
end-to-end responsibility for your solutions
Build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable Gen AI solutions
Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities
job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions running, deploying, testing, and automating GenAI solutions, which are core components of MLOps and productionizing AI systems.

phrases: groundbreaking Gen AI solutions
responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: The focus on 'Gen AI solutions' implies working with and adapting generative models, even if specific fine-tuning or RAG details are not explicitly stated.

phrases: valuable for our customers to use
Build responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions for millions of customers
job_tasks.justification: The job requires understanding customer value and building solutions that are cost-effective and serve a large customer base, indicating a need to align technical work with business objectives.

phrases: join a multi-disciplinary team
Work within a squad to learn how processes and systems work
Pair-program with other team members
Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'multi-disciplinary team', 'squad', 'pair-program', and 'receive help from peers' highlight the collaborative nature of the role.

phrases: learn how processes and systems work
Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders so we can improve together
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on learning within a squad and improving together suggests a need for continuous learning and adaptability.

phrases: build web applications autonomously from scratch
end-to-end responsibility for your solutions
solve critical or complex problems
responsible and cost-effective Gen AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: The ability to build autonomously, take end-to-end responsibility, solve complex problems, and focus on cost-effectiveness points to strong problem-solving and pragmatic skills.

phrases: build and run groundbreaking Gen AI solutions
build web applications autonomously from scratch
end-to-end responsibility for your solutions
Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks
job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes building 'groundbreaking' solutions autonomously, taking 'end-to-end responsibility', and creating 're-usable building blocks', indicating a need for innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Receive help from peers, experts, and stakeholders
learn how processes and systems work
build web applications autonomously from scratch
